ygData.subject: Re: WnS
ygData.msgSnippet: Werewolves are in W. Commons, W. Karana, Kithicor, and higher level ones in Mistmoor. There is a rare spawn named WW in S. Karana that has a lupine cloak too.
ygData.messageBody:
Werewolves are in W. Commons, W. Karana, Kithicor, and
higher level ones in Mistmoor. There is a rare spawn
named WW in S. Karana that has a lupine cloak too. He
is about level 30 I hear.

Belgarth Wolfstrider

--- Remlin <remlin@...> wrote:
> From: "Remlin" <remlin@...>
>
> they are in Kithicor Forest
>
> Later
> Chris
